entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
